item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2012?

Manifestations are beginning to take place. We have discussed the difference between Resolutions and Intentions, Set some NEW, YEARS INTENTIONS, and are moving towards visualizing Clarity. 

Did you know that Complaining can actually be helpful and healthy, as long as you do not allow these thoughts to persist. Complaining, like the Law of Attraction, brings Thoughts, Feelings and Clarity to our attention. We can easily define, in detail, what it is that we do not want, and gratefully, we can use it to help us clarify what it is that we do desire.   

Clarity, has helped me to create this NEW WEEKLY GROUP. I have manifested this intimate group which, at present, consists of 4 Creators who really want to manifest a change in their lives. We have begun to set our intentions in different areas of life and we are moving towards manifesting new beginnings.

We have just moved our location to a more Private, intimate, setting and are looking for 5-10 more conscious creators. If You are interested in manifesting new friends, making positive changes, and exploring endless possibilities, join us. Let's get together as we manifest what we really want to see happen this year.

We will be meeting from 7:00pm-8:30pm.

Please sign up and then I will be in touch with you about the Location and Directions.
See you soon!

Ellen
Motivational Facillitator

617-750-4830

Futrue meetings will include Discussion, Meditation, Visualization, Vision Boarding, & more.
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 The Year of Change - A New Weekly Meet-up
